amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in House Report 118-12 to expand the definition of schools to include secondary career and technical schools.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (OH) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Miller (OH).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (OH) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
